name: pocketdex
description: Pocketdex is an indexer for the Shannon implementation of the pocket network protocol.

scripts.build: subql codegen &&  sed -i 's/\[key: bigint\]/\[key: number\]/g' ./src/types/proto-interfaces/poktroll/application/application.ts && subql build
scripts.dev: subql codegen && subql build && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up --remove-orphans
scripts.build:develop: NODE_ENV=develop subql codegen &&  sed -i 's/\[key: bigint\]/\[key: number\]/g' ./src/types/proto-interfaces/poktroll/application/application.ts && NODE_ENV=develop subql build

author: Grove Team
